text:
I recently got this message:

BUILD FAILED
/Users/elharo/Projects/XOM/build.xml:731: The <unwar> type doesn't support the
"package" attribute.

This was due to a bug in my build.xml file. No big deal. However the line that
triggered the bug was this:

<unzip src="jaxen-1.1-src.zip" package="jaxen" dest="${build.dir}" />

Notice that this is an *unzip* task, not an *unwar* task. This is potentially
confusing. The error message should be fixed.
creator: elharo@metalab.unc.edu
jan@materne.de
text:
Verified on Ant 1.6.5, but doesnt occur on SVN-HEAD (Apache Ant version 1.7alpha
compiled on July 7 2006).

<project>
  <target name="war">
    <unwar package="x"/>
  </target>
  <target name="jar">
    <unjar package="x"/>
  </target>
  <target name="zip">
    <unzip package="x"/>
  </target>
</project>


Ant 1.7
------------------------------------------------------------
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage>ant zip
Buildfile: build.xml

zip:

BUILD FAILED
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage\build.xml:11: unzip doesn't support the
"package" attribute

Total time: 0 seconds
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage>ant jar
Buildfile: build.xml

jar:

BUILD FAILED
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage\build.xml:8: unjar doesn't support the
"package" attribute

Total time: 0 seconds
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage>ant war
Buildfile: build.xml

war:

BUILD FAILED
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage\build.xml:5: unwar doesn't support the
"package" attribute




Ant 1.6.5
------------------------------------------------------------
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage>ant zip
Buildfile: build.xml

zip:

BUILD FAILED
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage\build.xml:11: The <unwar> type doesn't
support the "package" attribute.

Total time: 1 second
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage>ant jar
Buildfile: build.xml

jar:

BUILD FAILED
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage\build.xml:8: The <unwar> type doesn't
support the "package" attribute.

Total time: 0 seconds
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage>ant war
Buildfile: build.xml

war:

BUILD FAILED
C:\tmp\ant-39993-unzip-errormessage\build.xml:3: The <unwar> type doesn't
support the "package" attribute.
creator: jan@materne.de
